title: List of all Android 3d game  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android 3d game  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: mingdx
repoList.description: A small libGDX based Java game library

repoList.name: 2D-Open-World-RPG
repoList.description: Summer 2016 - This is a 2D-Top-Down-RPG Game meant for the Android platform. It is built off of the libGDX libraries and currently includes working Collision Detection using Box2D and a self-made algorithm. The current build is a test map where the player can walk around. The player can also enter the house; however, it only leads to another test map. Animation is also implemented and the code has a scalable structure for future development.  I was working with a 3D Art student from CSU to create this. He helped with some of the design; however the code is all written by myself. It has been put aside for now as we've both become to busy to work on such a time-consuming project; however may be picked up again in the future.
